column1: cant get any better than this with the price win win such a good upgrade to my pc
it is the best ssd i have had so far and a great product for its price it is very fast as was reported by several independent benchmarks
this m2 ssd is 1000 worth it for ps5 or pc storage it is simple to follow and install and has amazing read and write speeds would definitely recommend this awesome product
fantastic choice of m2 ssd for the playstation 5

couldnt be happier with the product
the speed is blazing fast as ive tested with some read write tests getting over 7000mbs reads
and it reflects in how quickly i can boot into windows
easy install nearly 6000 read speed more than recommended from sony im happy

this item its great
happy to have it
works brilliant and easy to install on ps5
this is a must have item for the ps5 money well spent and no regrets and easy to install
wow this is so fast and highly recomend this works great on my ps5 and so easy to do and im not good at this sort of thing this is a must have
easy to install great speed and faultless use great add on for your ps5 thoroughly recommended

bought the 1tb sn850 gen 4 version and couldnt be more pleased ive owned sabrant and samsung drives in the past and this is in my experience the best value for money in the higher end segment
extremely fast and no issues so far

highly recommended

great price easy to install runs really well

bought for £119 on black friday deal absolutely brilliant fit for ps5

bought this for my ps5 couldnt recommend enough thank you

and does not disappoint ps5 instantly recognised it and gave blistering readwrite speeds 100 recommend for ps5 shout or from the roof tops

great value great for games easy to use software
very fast shipping very good ssd and fast loading ssd

love this ssd with an easy install and the sticker just comes out without any residue when installing it also has got a great read and write speed that varies every now and then but does the job as described
perfect for ps5 if firing to ps5 you will need a heatsink super easy to install would highly recommend
easy to install ps5 picks it up straight away and performance is great cant fault it
happy with the module easy to instal

great product and great price

real speed and almost to the max it can be theres barely small percentage of heat there very easy to install
totally recommended
excellent product lightning speedso go ontreat yourselfbuy oneyou wont go wrong

i paired this with the sabrent ps5 heat sink and its been perfect in my ps5 1tb is more than enough storage i now have 27 games installed of varying sizes and still have 500gb left for more

if you have a ps5 and want extra space this is a great choice

what can i really say that everyone hasnt already its great very fast the software is also good to use to very trusted brand so im happy with it havent tested it for gaming though im a sound editor and its perfect for my needs

super quick and fast works perfectly in my ps5 bought a heatsink separately which was much cheaper than buying the one with a heatsink pre installed definitely worth getting if you want more space on your ps5
works perfectly and easy to install

so ive picked this drive up on black friday for my ps5 and it works great after installing it the ps5 formats the drive and does a benchmark test the ps5 requires something at 55 g per second or above the sn850 comes back with a figure of 67 so its very close to the rated 70 on the box
perfect and highly recommended
is very good makes all my games load in a lot faster than my old one
i am using it for a month and it is fast and not so hot about 55 c very happy to purchase it
works great for the ps5 with a speed of 6538 mbs i also brought qivynsry m2 heatsink 2280 ssd doublesided heat sink which also fits with the ps5 including the cover

purchased along with a heat sink for my ps5 absolutely no issues with the product speeds are topnotch in fact they appear slightly better than the installed ssd packaging was secure and the literature did the job overall did exactly what i wanted 100 recommend
great so happy to have more space in my ps5 a heatsink is necessary i only got 62006400 but nevermind
excellent m2 drive
brilliant easy to install and blisteringly fast no more to say really
no issues running it inside of ps5 very happy with the performance

great quality and works perfectly in the ps5 when fitted in the ssd expansion bay you need to buy a separate heatsink for this drive before fitting it in the ps5 the drive itself is very quick and easily matches the internal drive already in the ps5 for speed
perfect for playstation 5 make sure you also buy a heat sink
ideal upgrade for playstation 5 or a pc with pcie 40 one of the best m2 ssd available on the market
simply bought this to increase the storage in my ps5 going great so far

good product for ps5 requires separate head shield for instillation which is relatively easy to install with a step by step youtube guide offers good storage capacity which i found is essential with the size of games these days very good for ps5 and gaming
super easy to install a tone of memory for nearly 8 games which ive already installed and still lots of memory left highly recommend this
even though my pc doesnt support the 7000 it is noticeable faster and never goes down on speed awesome choice might buy another to improve other laptop too it is just great

when checking disk speeds its actually faster then stated so was happy
quality ssd recently installed to my ps5 and paired with the elecgear heatsink quality combination speeds are as fast as expected

extra 1tb storage for the ps5 works perfectly within the machine and so easy to fit within the heatsink that i purchased separately would highly recommend if your looking for extra storage for the playstation 5

this is great works as it should

its storage what else is there to say
works well easy to install needs a seperate heatsink good size memory and far exceeds ps5 requirements
amazing speeds

what a great little device was initially concerned over installing but theres loads of quirks on youtube i have used a compatible heat sink which was a little fiddly to install but again easy once you have looked at some guides the ps5 internal memory is woefully too small but this item makes a massive difference enjoy
this drive flies fastest drive ive ever seen i paid £130 but irritatingly its only £120 now but im still happy with my purchase
great item does what it supposed to do works fine in the ps5 with no issues
easy install on ps5 just remember a decent heat sinkonce done speed is excellent

easy to install worked right of the bat transferred bulk of games really fast about 500gb in 5 mins have been playing assassins creed odyssey of it with all upgrades and running just as fast as internal drive no obvious framerate drops ps5 recognises the drives as around 6500mbs highly recommended
so easy to install

what can you say bad about this nvme absolutely nothing what an amazing upgrade performance is out of this world i have great envy for my sons gaming rig it out performs my works laptop lol my home pc and more so out performs hardware that i install for some customer projects that run some serious systems
works perfect for the ps5 just installed but please do get a slim line heatsink
totally worth it
nothing to dislike excellent price fast as hell and works perfectly in the ps5 in fact mark cerny the lead engineer of the playstation 4 and 5 has this exact model in his own ps5
easy to install and fantastic performance cost per gb is high but you buy this for the speed massively shortened my load times in almost all applications
bought for use with ps5 and combined with qivynsry m2 heatsink nvme 2280 ssd does exactly what its supposed to so far so good

best m2 to date remember you need a cpu and mobo capable of pci4 to get full capability but it has backwards compatibility with pci3 so

you cant miss
perfect to ps5
does what it says on the tin perfect and budget friendly upgrade for the ps5 its now my main storage for games no noticeable dip in load speeds and quite possibly an improvement

good speed on my ps5 needs a heatsink fitted but was a fairly easy job

its expensive most of you wont need an ssd like thisim not even sure i do but its just fast
i bought this because i saw a recommendation from a gaming website and i can confirm that it is exactly the upgrade that the ps5 needed for the storage that it should have come with

installed this along with a heatsink in my ps5 booted up and formatted straight away drive was showing 6500mbs read and has a full 1tb of available storage

i transferred all my installed games onto it and they run absolutely flawlessly you wont notice any difference between this and the disk that ships with the ps5 so im really pleased
quick and easy to install in to my ps5 need slim line heatsink for best result
lightening quick in my ps5 easy to fit and set up well worth the money and totally outclasses the ssd that sony use
working like a charm
very easy to install

youre gonna want some cooling for this one either the included m2 motherboard heatsink or some £10 heatsink off amazon cos it gets hot any heatsink is enough to run it at its full potential and at its full potential its one of the best ssds you can buy
i bought this ssd to expand my ps5 storage using a cheap heatsink online set up was easy and it surpasses the ps5 speed requirements havent had any issues so far it also comes with 5 year warranty
works grate had no issues with ps5 im loving the extra storage but very pricey for what it is
easy to install to ps5 good read speed and no issues

so i purchased this along with a heatsink to install in a ps5

the sn850 is well regarded in pcmr to be a very good ssd has the latest gen4 speeds and competitive prices for the 1tb storage option at the time of buying there is nothing to complain about this i am sure that this is also compatible for the ps5 so anyone who does have this console should consider the 2tb option given that it is around £200

fast reliable and simple to install works great with ps5 just add a heatsink and then you are good to go plenty fast enough for the ps5 added 1tb of storage but because the os is not installed onto this you get most of the space to use for games so can install plenty on here
works well with the ps5 and the speeds are as advertised

easy to install in my asus rog strix x570f motherboard runs like a dream alongside the amd 5800x noticeable improvement to load times in apps and games over my wd sata ssd astronomical improvement when processing large multi gb datasets in python

son fitted no problem along with heat sink on xmas day both working fine

i got this as the ssds that came with a heat sink built in cost a fortune this was half the price of the version with built in heat sink so just had to get one to attach which cost me less than a tenner it was simple to fit and then the whole unit was simple to plug in

i was up and running within 15 minutes so a great bargain
exactly as described and well priced

i was looking for a good compromise between cost capacity and speed the offer of 5 months interest free credit was a benefit as long as youre happy to remove the base of your laptop fitting is really easy using a program such as macrium reflect free or aomei partition assistant then gives you an easy means of cloning your old drive to the new one
bought the 1tb variant works fine on my ps5 read speeds of 6548 mbs

over 6500mbs reported when installed in my ps5 and working perfectly

worth considering for those after more space
bought to add storage for a ps5 works a treat
i replaced the stock m2 in my asus tuf fx705 with one of these no issues in comparison to what was in before this drive is very fast

fitted to my 12th gen laptop even though the one fitted by manufacturer was rated at gen 4 this m2 absolutely leaves it standing as can be seen by the pic attached the 2gbs is a kingston drive vs the western digital as you can see a massive improvement no issues experienced on the 3 i have bought 1tb versions and no issues with windows 11
good value for a top performer
picked this up to go with a new pcie 4 motherboard super super fast and ideal for my motherboard which came with a heat sink this ssd does not

good value for money when paired with an appropriate heatsink gives me enough extra storage on ps5 for ps4 games to fit but mostly there is enough room for games even if your a hoarder ha just delete and redownload games overnight if you can afford 2 or 4gb options id say go for it but right now this should be enough
fast install but and should be much cheaper to make more easily available to everyone
great
slotted into ps5 easily and worked after format no issues

combined with a nvme m2 ssd enclosure this card delivers 27002800 mbs on a mac mini m1 which is the same as the internal drive not a cheap combination but still a lot cheaper than 1tb extra internal apple ssd and worth it if you want your external ssd to be just as fast

i upgraded to this from a 250gb samsung that was getting a bit full and cost about the same price a few years previous the speeds are quite similar in that theyre really quick im not sure how much difference you notice when theyre this fast i did a benchmark and it was double the speed of the old drive

fits into ps5 memory slot easily theres videos on youtube that you can follow auto detected on power up ps5 prompted to format even though its not required so we did anyway takes less than a minute to do that all done and usable
super speed
good

easy install between 5 and 10 minutes

buy at a discount price for my pc work normally

its fast enough to keep pace and no packet loss
had a little confusion when installing but eventually realised the problem was me have used this daily as my boot drive for three months and had no issues
value for money

does what its meant to do

instant to read and write significantly reduce loading time for large openworld games a little bit expensive though

as title

ordered this from amazon eu sarl it arrived in a sn850 box with sn850 labels on it but wasnt a sn850 it was a sn750 the prior model £90 cheaper at time of purchase and pcie 30 not 40
make sure have a gen 4 slot in motherboard to get 7000mbs otherwise will automatically downgrade to gen3 3500mbs or gen2 1600mbs
beware if you have a msi motherboard with a ryzen build at least happened for me 8 out of 10 cold boot the motherboard wont find this nvme card but my other sabrent nvme card worked just fine

so after looking at custom pc website for there recomended list this ssd was on top

the speed has stopped my motherboad having a funny five minutes when downloading a file and a normal hhd is up to the job loading games is just on another level
the disgraceful packaging looks like mice had a good dinner eating it but the ssd itself looks fine hopefully the ssd works

i had issues with my laptop over heating and it was down to having high spec processor and big memory capacity with a poor ssd with low read and write capacity i was new to installing new hardware into my laptop but nothing i couldnt find out on online tutorials very happy
quick easily installation in my ps5 i was lead to believe the item came with a heat sink as the majority of this range do unfortunately it did not so i had to purchase one separately
fast load times on games such as the massive fs2020

great ssd i cant use it properly but thats my fault just check you mobo supports before buying as its an expensive upgrade to be able to utilise as chances are youll need a new processor to go on the new motherboard
i was disappointed to discover both my ryzen 4700u and 4800u have only pcie gen 3 so cant take full advantage of the performance available however i am future proofed and the price was right

watch out for the warrant email wd explain where you bought it and make sure to put it came in retail box and an oem package youll need to provide invoice number and pic of box also pic of invoice other than that blistering in my x570

i bought this to replace an aorus 1tb nvme gen4 the aorus was advertised at 5000mbs and on my pc it exceeded 5000mbs this drive is stated as having 7000mbs 1tb version but it falls short as seen in screenshot
nothing else to say
i should have tested the drive empty but alas i didnt i tested at just under 30 full and the results were significantly lower than advertised around 5000 read and 3000 write
the drive itself it great but the fact that wd didnt bother to include the screw to install it is very disappointing
not as good as samsung 980 pro which can go up 7100mbps this one only got 6200mbps probably bottleneck of the mb plus using the tool from samsung xd

beware if you have an msi ryzen build the drive disappears from bios 50 of the time so basically useless and means you have to constantly reboot until it appears

ive seen other reports of this specifically with the wd blacks so avoid and go with something else
installed in xps 9510 has made windows noticeably snappier to use explorer and programs open up very quickly annoyingly it takes 3 seconds longer to boot than the stockslower ssd yet to work out why
my asus b660 mobo didnt detect this drive to begin with i had to fiddle with the bios settings for hours until it worked
